title: I Never Should’ve Asked Him To Fix Her Sink
itunes:title: I Never Should’ve Asked Him To Fix Her Sink
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, after 18 years of knowing my fiancé, she cut the fool. I’ve been divorced for 21 years and my 4 children are all grown. She’s divorced too so there was never any pressure to get remarried, but I proposed recently because she’s the perfect woman in every way. She was getting her house ready to be sold and move in with me. Her kitchen sink leaked and the disposer didn’t work, so I asked my oldest son to take a look at it.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, after 18 years of knowing my fiancé, she cut the fool. I’ve been divorced for 21 years and my 4 children are all grown. She was getting her house ready to be sold and move in with me. Her kitchen sink leaked and the disposer didn’t work, so I asked my oldest son to take a look at it.................
